"Ilma": "Thanks, you're the best. Now our research can proceed."
"...Ah, by the way, while I'm talking to you... It's about Manon's situation."
"...Oh, nah, it's nothing bad, don't worry. Actually the opposite, she's practically leading the Survey Team now."
"I think she was headed for Southern Aelio by herself."
"The Starless could appear anywhere at any time, so I'm a little worried for her. Would you mind going to check on her?"
